medical_history.chief_complaint: Upper abdominal and upper back pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient experienced upper abdominal and back pain after previously being seen for nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea. The pain is constant, sharp, and has been described as significant. Symptoms worsened after returning to work following a brief improvement at home. Patient has not experienced similar pain before and denies any nausea, vomiting, diarrhea since yesterday morning.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Mild right renal pyelectasis without hydronephrosis; PPD positive (received BCG as a child); no surgical history.
